name: Concrete Hands Circuit
duration: 30s max rope slams → 30s dirty boxing combos → x5 rounds
notes: Ropes fatigue arms before punch output - mimics late-round flurries

name: Pavement Pounder
duration: 10 L/R hammer strikes → 5 tire flips → x5 rounds
notes: Transfers to hook power and mauling stamina

name: Back-Alley Brawler
duration: 30s sandbag bear hug → 10 sprawls → x5 rounds
notes: Simulates clinch control and defensive urgency

name: Ding-Dong Roundhouse

notes: Snatches = uppercut transfer, bands simulate fatigue

name: Phone Booth Killer

name: Brick Fist Protocol

name: Gutter War Special

notes: Pushes = ring-cutting, thrusters = combos under fatigue

name: Last Call Circuit

notes: Pure desperation conditioning for championship rounds

name: Smashmouth Shovel Hook

name: Backfoot Butcher

notes: Golden era catch wrestling conditioning

name: Thai Clinch Crusher

notes: Swings mimic pull-down mechanics for knee strikes. Maintain upright Muay Thai posture.

name: Knee Executioner

name: Wall War Protocol
duration: 30s wall pressure → 10 short elbows → x5 rounds
notes: Trains cutting off space and striking in confined areas. Focus on framing and head position.

name: Judo Clinch Transition

notes: Develops defensive reactions against judo-style clinch takedowns.

name: Smesh Prep Circuit
notes: Snatches mimic explosive head control adjustments for cage wrestling.

notes: From turtle, stand up and circle out repeatedly.

name: Brawler's Body Shot Guard
notes: High guard while walking bag down with body shots.

name: Distance Striker's Angle Drill
notes: 45-degree steps off centerline between cones.

name: MMA Wall-Walk Conditioning
notes: Stand back up from seated position using cage.

name: Counter Striker's Parry Drill
notes: Parry bag strikes while maintaining distance.

name: Kicker's Switch Stance March
notes: Switch stances every 10 steps with teep feints.

name: Grappler's Standup Chain
notes: From bottom, stand up and immediately sprawl.

name: Pressure Fighter's Cutoff Shadow
notes: Advance while cutting off angles in mirror.

name: Clinch Fighter's Frame Endurance
notes: Maintain frames against partner's forward pressure.

name: Hybrid's Transition Circuit
notes: Alternate between striking and shot feints.

name: Scrambler's Hip Escape Marathon
notes: Continuous hip escapes down mat length.

name: Distance Striker's Teep Maintenance
notes: 1 teep every 10 seconds. Reset completely.
